content:
# FACTORIO AGENT REPORT

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Smelting Station at Position(0.0, 0.0)
Consists of a stone furnace that was set up to smelt iron ore into iron plates. The agent placed the furnace and inserted coal and iron ore into it to produce iron plates.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to craft items that require raw resources
- Make sure to gather all necessary raw resources (like stone) before attempting to craft items that require them
- Stone is a raw resource that must be gathered, not crafted

### Errors when trying to craft items that require furnace smelting
- Items like iron-plate cannot be directly crafted; they require smelting iron ore in a furnace
- Set up furnaces to produce the necessary intermediate materials before attempting to craft items that require them

### Errors when trying to craft multiple items at once
- When crafting items that require intermediate materials that need to be smelted (like iron-gear-wheels requiring iron plates), craft them one at a time
- Ensure you have enough materials for each individual crafting operation
- The agent successfully crafted iron gear wheels one at a time but failed when trying to craft multiple at once
